services

We manage deep energy retrofits and extensions as general contractors, blending high-performance construction with meticulous project management. From airtightness and insulation to mechanical systems and clean energy integration, our whole-building approach delivers results that meet certifications such as Passive House, EnerPHit, Net Zero, and Net Zero Ready. At the core of every project is clear communication, careful budget tracking, and reliable scheduling. Beyond energy efficiency, we ensure interiors and exteriors are finished with the same care and attention as the work behind the walls. Our mission is to create sustainable, energy-efficient spaces that excel in execution, performance, and design.

Our consultancy services support contractors and building owners in achieving high-performance results at any stage of their project. From evaluating retrofit potential in the early stages to integrating advanced design details and overseeing execution, we provide strategies that ensure sustainability, efficiency, and success. For projects we cannot take on directly, our consultancy offers the knowledge and tools needed to navigate the challenges of high-performance construction, empowering clients to achieve exceptional outcomes independently.

Airtightness and insulation are essential to high-performance buildings, and our Envelope Sealing Specialist service ensures these elements are executed with precision. Whether in new construction or retrofit projects, we apply membranes, tapes, and insulation to create a continuous airtight seal and maximize energy efficiency. Installing high-performance triple-pane windows is a complex process where precision is critical. Proper installation ensures these windows deliver their full efficiency, durability, and performance. By addressing every detail during this phase, we guarantee a building envelope that exceeds industry standards.

We identify properties with strong retrofit potential and manage their transformation—from design to commissioning. Each project is driven by innovation and built to meet the highest standards of sustainability, performance, and resilience. With a focus on thoughtful design, precise execution, and a long-term vision, we create spaces that are efficient, future-ready, and built to last.
